identity.visual_style: Dark Glass, Tactical Obsidian, Biometric Neon
design_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix tactical gear aesthetics with premium fintech UI
Emotion First: Security = Calm + Confidence. No clutter, just control.
Content is King: The 'Unlock' action is the hero. Everything else is secondary.
Zoom In: Big, tactile buttons. You shouldn't miss the button when you're in a rush.
Negative Space: Dark voids to create focus.

typography.installation_guide: Use 'expo-font' to load these Google Fonts. Fallback to System Sans-Serif if loading fails.

usage.status_closed: Text Muted or Danger Red (if locked securely)

elements: Input: Server URL (Pre-filled or simple entry)
Tenant Selector (Dropdown styled as bottom sheet or card)
Header: User Avatar + Greeting + Connection Status
Door Card: Name, Location, Status (Open/Closed), Last Access Time
Central Visual: Large Lock Icon / Door State Visualization
Main Action: Big Circular 'OPEN' Button with Fingerprint Icon

images.background_texture: Subtle noise or carbon fiber pattern (optional CSS/SVG)

interactions.feedback: Show Toast or Snackbar on success/error

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup 'expo-font' and load 'Outfit' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans'.
2. Create a 'theme.js' or 'constants/colors.js' to centralize the palette.
3. Refactor all screens to use the new Dark Mode palette.
4. Replace native Buttons with custom TouchableOpacity components matching the 'premium' specs.
6. Ensure the Biometric Auth flow feels 'high-tech' - use animations or color shifts.
7. DO NOT use default React Native 'Button' component. Build a 'PrimaryButton' component.
8. Use SafeAreaView correctly with a black background.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
